thread.title: 'Trump Draws' Is The Lighthearted Twitter Account We Need Right Now - Digg
thread.title_full: 'Trump Draws' Is The Lighthearted Twitter Account We Need Right Now - Digg

author: Dan Fallon
title: 'Trump Draws' Is The Lighthearted Twitter Account We Need Right Now - Digg
text: Live 'Trump Draws' Is The Lighthearted Twitter Account We Need Right Now OUR PRESIDENT IS AN ARTIST 'Trump Draws' Is The Lighthearted Twitter Account We Need Right Now Feb 1 2017, 12:06 AM 9 diggs Blacklist story Blacklist domain ​D epending on where you fall on the political spectrum, t he first week and a half of President Trump's term have been either shocking and depressing or pretty darn great. But if there's one thing we can all agree on, it's that if a famous person holds up a sheet of paper on camera — as President Trump has done multiple times while signing executive orders — the internet must come together to photoshop ridiculous stuff onto that paper. The new Trump meme has been percolating since late last week — it hit the big time with this shocking announcement about anime: HOLY SHIT HE ACTUALLY DID IT pic.twitter.com/rlHZIl2Uue — ＭｏｗｔｅｎＤｏｏ Ｓｅｎｐａｉ (@MowtenDoo) January 27, 2017
